definition: Mt Danxia in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong/Danxia landform (red conglomerate and sandstone)
red/pellet/powder/cinnabar
rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset
Mt Danxia in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong
Danxia landform (red conglomerate and sandstone)

sentences.english: Cross halcyon water area, you can see swim of far red glow.
sentences.chinese: 穿过宁静的水域，你会看见远处丹霞浮水。

sentences.english: According to its spatial distribution patterns and regional differences, three major Danxia landform concentrated areas in China are identified in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了三大丹霞地貌集中分布区的景观异质性。

sentences.english: Apart from these young Danxia landforms, a variety of metamorphic rocks can also be viewed at the source of the Laodao River.
sentences.chinese: 捞刀河源头区除了这年轻的丹霞，还有各种变质岩。

sentences.english: The Xinjiang Basin is one of the typical areas in China where develop typical Danxia landforms.
sentences.chinese: 信江盆地是我国丹霞地貌发育最典型的区域之一。

sentences.english: Red glow burrow is another marvellous spectacle of Tai Ning.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞洞穴是泰宁的另一奇观。

sentences.english: Danxia mountain is a would-famous geological park with its plentiful tourist resources.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞山是世界地质公园，具有丰富的旅游资源。

sentences.english: Danxia Landforms consist of red sedimentary rock and steep cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞下由玄色的重积岩和峻峭的山崖构成。

sentences.english: Langshan landscape area is a new discovered famous scenic area in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 崀山风景区的造景地貌是丹霞地貌。

sentences.english: Danxia landform is a kind of particular landform scenery.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞地貌是一种独特的地貌景观资源。

sentences.english: The oldest metamorphic rock and the youngest Danxia landscapes coexist.
sentences.chinese: 这里，湖南最老的变质岩和最年青的丹霞共存。

sentences.english: The tourist areas of Elder Peak, Yangyuanshi (Male Stone) and Xianglong Lake in the Danxia Scenic Spot Area are open to the public.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞景区中外开放的有长老峰，阳元山，和翔龙湖。

the five ranges separating Hunan and Jiangxi from south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi, namely: Dayu 大庾嶺|大庾岭[Da4 yu3 ling3], Dupang 都龐嶺|都庞岭[Du1 pang2 ling3], Qitian 騎田嶺|骑田岭[Qi2 tian2 ling3], Mengzhu 萌渚嶺|萌渚岭[Meng2 zhu3 ling3] and Yuecheng 越城嶺|越城岭[Yue4 cheng2 ling3]

Jiuyi mountain range in Hunan on the border with Guangdong
Tianshan mountain range between XinJiang and Mongolia and Kyrgyzstan
Stone Forest, notable set of limestone formations in Yunnan
the peaks of a mountain range
